temperatures.description: Enclosing container for the components in the system.

temperature.description: List of components, keyed by component name.

name.description: Device name for the component -- this will not be a configurable parameter on many implementations

instant.description: The instantaneous value of the statistic.

avg.description: The arithmetic mean value of the statistic over the sampling period.

min.description: The minimum value of the statistic over the sampling period.

max.description: The maximum value of the statistic over the sampling period.

interval.description: The time interval over which the min/max/average statistics are computed by the system.

min-time.description: The absolute time at which the minimum value occurred.

max-time.description: The absolute time at which the maximum value occurred.

alarm-status.description: A value of true indicates the alarm has been raised or asserted.  The value should be false when the alarm is cleared.

alarm-threshold.description: The threshold value that was crossed for this alarm.

alarm-severity.description: The severity of the current alarm.

cpus.description: Enclosing container for the components in the system.

sys-cpu.description: List of components, keyed by component name.

avg.description: The arithmetic mean value of the percentage measure of the statistic over the sampling period.

min.description: The minimum value of the percentage measure of the statistic over the sampling period.

max.description: The maximum value of the percentage measure of the statistic over the sampling period.

interval.description: The time interval over which the min/max/average statistics are computed by the system.

user.description: Percentage of CPU time spent running in user space.

avg.description: The arithmetic mean value of the percentage measure of the statistic over the sampling period.

min.description: The minimum value of the percentage measure of the statistic over the sampling period.

max.description: The maximum value of the percentage measure of the statistic over the sampling period.

interval.description: The time interval over which the min/max/average statistics are computed by the system.

kernel.description: Percentage of CPU time spent running in kernel space.

min.description: The minimum value of the percentage measure of the statistic over the sampling period.

max.description: The maximum value of the percentage measure of the statistic over the sampling period.

interval.description: The time interval over which the min/max/average statistics are computed by the system.

nice.description:
Percentage of CPU time spent running low-priority (niced)
user processes.
